title: THE HOURS OF THE PASSION OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST
description: THE HOURS OF THE PASSION gives a vivid account of the last 24 hours of the life of Jesus Christ. The hour by hour breakdown of the events reveal the sorrowful details of his death. This is private revelation given to Luisa Piccarreta, a saintly catholic mystic. We hear Jesus as he prays and speaks with the Father, we see his humility, undiminished love, complete self-sacrifice.
author: Susanne  James
